name: a SMOL amount wont kill you
description: batrachotoxin: lethal dose 1-2 µg/kg   BUT: dont be afraid this is just one molecule and it weighs only 538.681mol so you can safely enjoy its beauty and be delighted by the fact that this deadly poison is produced by a bunch very cute, colorful and VERY SMOL species in the family of dendrobatidae aka the poison dart frog
